short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have a better experience on ChatGPT with response length control and scroll to response top!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to optimize your ChatGPT interactions with two handy features:

1. Response Length Control: Set limits on how long ChatGPT's responses are. Whether you need concise answers or detailed explanations, you’re in charge of the response length to fit your needs.

2. Scroll to Response Top: Quickly scroll to the top of ChatGPT’s latest response with a single click. No more tedious scrolling—easily review the entire response without the hassle!
